project.name: Prometheus AI Tutor
project.description: Bilingual AI-powered tutoring system for Rabdan Academy professional training programs

context.overview: This is an educational AI tutor application built as a single-file HTML application with embedded CSS and JavaScript. It serves training content for defense, security, and crisis management sectors at Rabdan Academy in Abu Dhabi, UAE.

important_files.src/prometheus-ai-tutor-v2.html: Main production application with all features
important_files.docs/: Executive proposal and technical specification documents

development_guidelines: Maintain single-file architecture for easy deployment
Always update translations object when adding UI text
Test both English and Arabic modes after changes
Ensure graceful degradation when API unavailable
Keep mobile responsiveness in all UI changes

common_tasks.add_module: Add to modules array, update translations for both languages, update course outline
common_tasks.add_ui_text: Add to translations.en and translations.ar objects
common_tasks.change_branding: Update CSS variables at top of <style> section
common_tasks.add_quiz_questions: Add to module's questions array with question, options, correct index

manual_checklist: Toggle language and verify all text updates
Test voice synthesis in both languages
Complete a quiz and verify scoring
Test with API configured and without
Verify mobile layout on narrow viewport
Check RTL alignment in Arabic mode

deployment.notes: No build process required - single HTML file deployment
